A dystopian world where machines and technology have overtaken humans, and children are the only ones left to rule it. They have to navigate through the complex systems and navigate the world without any guidance from adults.
A post-apocalyptic world where the remaining children have to band together to survive and rule. They have to work together to find resources, build shelter, and defend themselves from any threats.

A fantasy world where children are granted magical powers and are tasked with protecting their kingdom from any threats. They have to work together to defeat their enemies and maintain peace in their land.

A science fiction world where children are the only ones left to save the planet from an alien invasion. They have to use their intelligence and resourcefulness to come up with a plan to defeat the invaders and save humanity.
